name: Manana on the Move
description:
All the fruits have been scattered from their bowl, as Manana you must use portals to travel between dimensions in order to collect them all. The art is based off the works on Andy Warhol such as the Campbell's Soup Can and the Velvet Underground Banana. I hope you enjoy my creation

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys --> Movement
  • Space bar --> Jump
  • M --> Enter portals
  • Hold R --> Retry
